## BeraBorrowStoreListenerParams interface

Parameters passed to [BeraBorrowStore](./lib-base.beraborrowstore.md) listeners.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BeraBorrowStoreListenerParams<T = unknown> 
```

## Remarks

Use the [subscribe()](./lib-base.beraborrowstore.subscribe.md) function to register a listener.

|  Property | Type | Description |
